page.title: 08Transport-A259 at Dymchurch
page.content: The A 259 starts at Folkestone & ends at Weston in Sussex.It's a single lane highway.The road is busiest during the Summer in the tourist season.It runs through Dymchurch parallel to the sea wall.Children travel to school along the A 259:(1)by bicycle-7% (2)car-37% (3)bus-30% (4)walking-26%. A 6 hour traffic census on July 2nd 1985 showed vehicles using the road were: cars 3962 lorries & vans 466 bicycles 149 motor-cycles 108 army vehicles 56 coaches 26 buses 24 caravans 24 ambulances 5 police cars 1 A sign of tourism - the cars with for- eign registration -1%.
